title: Businessweek Extra - Ted Leonsis on Sports Technology
itunes:title: Businessweek Extra - Ted Leonsis on Sports Technology
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.Featuring an in-depth conversation with Ted Leonsis, Monumental Sports and Entertainment chief executive officer and owner of the Washington Wizards, about technology in the NBA.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
